artifact.description:
Artifact is a buff that will negate the next debuff on that unit.
Each stack of Artifact can block 1 application of: Weak, Vulnerable,  Poison,Frail, Strength Loss, etc

vulnerable.description: Vulnerable creatures take 50% more damage from Attacks.

strength.descprition: Strength is a buff that increases damage dealt by Attacks.

buffer.description: Prevent the next X times you would lose HP.

weak.descprition: Weak creatures deal 25% less damage with Attacks.
